title: Radsporttechnik Müller builds a properly wide, insanely light 1060g 29″ Boost XC wheelset
content:
There’s light, and then there’s light. Or Extralite, as it may be. That’s certainly on order with one of the lightest 29″ XC wheelsets with a wide internal rim width that we’ve seen. Of course, they also include a heavy price tag and a light rider weight limit, but if weight savings is the main

The post Radsporttechnik Müller builds a properly wide, insanely light 1060g 29″ Boost XC wheelset appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
